DdMd::Exchanger Class Reference
MPI Communication

Detailed Description

Class for exchanging Atoms, Ghosts and Groups between processors.

Definition at line 135 of file Exchanger.cpp.

void DdMd::Exchanger::exchange ( )

Exchange local atoms and ghosts.

This method should be called just before rebuilding the neighbor list on each processor, to exchange ownership of local atoms and to exchange ghost atoms. The lists of which atoms were sent and received as ghosts by this method are used in subsequent calls to update.

Definition at line 142 of file Exchanger.cpp.

References exchangeAtoms(), and UTIL_THROW.

Referenced by DdMd::TwoStepIntegrator::run(), DdMd::NvtIntegrator::setup(), DdMd::NveIntegrator::setup(), and DdMd::Integrator::setupAtoms().

void DdMd::Exchanger::exchangeAtoms ( )

Exchange ownership of local atoms.

This method exchanges ownershp of local atoms, and calculates communication plan for ghost atoms, but but does not actually exchange ghost atoms.

Referenced by exchange().

void DdMd::Exchanger::update ( )

Update ghost atom coordinates.

This method should be called every time step for which there is no exhange of atom ownership. It communicates ghost coordinates for the same ghosts as those sent by the most recent call to the exchangeGhosts() methods.

Definition at line 1148 of file Exchanger.cpp.

References DdMd::Buffer::beginRecvBlock(), DdMd::Buffer::beginSendBlock(), DdMd::Buffer::clearSendBuffer(), DdMd::Domain::communicator(), DdMd::Domain::destRank(), Util::Dimension, DdMd::Buffer::endSendBlock(), DdMd::Buffer::packUpdate(), DdMd::Atom::position(), DdMd::Buffer::sendRecv(), DdMd::Domain::shift(), DdMd::Domain::sourceRank(), DdMd::Buffer::unpackUpdate(), and UTIL_THROW.

Referenced by DdMd::TwoStepIntegrator::run().

void DdMd::Exchanger::reverseUpdate ( )

Update ghost atom forces.

This method reverse the communication pattern used to communicate ghost atom positions in update() to reverse communicate forces acting on ghost atoms. It should be called iff reverse force communication on every time step for which update() is called.
